---

## ⚠️ IMPORTANT: DO NOT REPORT PUBLICLY

**Please DO NOT create public issues for security vulnerabilities.**

Instead:
1. Create a **private security advisory** on GitHub
2. Or email the maintainers directly (if email is configured)

See [SECURITY.md](../../SECURITY.md) for detailed instructions on responsible disclosure.

---

If this is a low-severity issue or a security best practice suggestion (not an active vulnerability), you may continue with this template:

## Issue Type

- [ ] Security best practice suggestion
- [ ] Documentation improvement for security
- [ ] Low-severity configuration issue

## Description

Describe the security concern or suggestion.

## Impact

What is the potential impact of this issue?

## Proposed Solution

How should this be addressed?

## References

- [OWASP Top 10](https://owasp.org/www-project-top-ten/)
- [CWE Top 25](https://cwe.mitre.org/top25/)
